name: Kiran
greetingText: I really like your name! especially Shehzadi
wishText: May the Allah always be with you! ;)
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! Yeee Guu Kha! Many many happy blah...
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text3: But then I Thought jany do. Mutur paneer py focus kro .
